Title: Avatar: The Way of Water
Plot: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar mo~Iy4rUtXsOtqT4EjsEvT-CtKwVPWYOt3fdRXtVA~mU-qlAxJHBfDt-kCFJJIuYUBeb8q1b8tP-~W9bES0T9a75L6bWTzyxxEIY9jgI6Scq5pj1uAIncxKdXGZAcyQhCdkw__&Key-Pair-Id=APKAIFLZBVQZ24NQH3KA

Title: Top Gun: Maverick
Plot: After thirty Years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to fly it.

Title: Jurassic World Dominion
Plot: Four Years after Isla Nublar has been destroyed, dinosaurs now live--and hunt--alongside humans all over the world. This fragile balance will reshape the future and determine, once and for all, whether human beings are to remain the apex predators on a planet they now share with history's most fearsome creatures.

Title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
Plot: Queen Ramonda, Shuri, M'Baku, Okoye and the Dora Milaje fight to protect their nation from intervening world powers in the wake of King T'Challa's death. As the Wakandans strive to embrace their next chapter, the heroes must band together with the help of War Dog Nakia and Everett Ross and forge a new path for the kingdom of Wakanda.

Title: The Batman
Plot: In his second Year of fighting crime, Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham City that connects to his own family while facing a serial killer known as the Riddler.

Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Actors: Morgan Freeman as Ellis Boyd 'Red' Redding
Clancy Brown as Captain Byron T. Hadley
Plot: Imprisoned in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison, where he puts his accounting skills to work for an amoral warden. During his long stretch in prison, Dufresne comes to be admired by the other inmates -- including an older prisoner named Red -- for his integrity and unquenchable sense of hope.

Title: The Godfather
Actors: Marlon Brando as Don Vito Corleone
Richard S. Actorsellano as Pete Clemenza
Plot: Spanning the Years 1945 to 1955, the film chronicles the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family. When organized crime family patriarch Vito Corleone barely survives an attempt on his life, his youngest son, Michael, steps in to take care of the would-be killers, launching a campaign of bloody revenge.

Title: The Dark Knight
Actors: Christian Bale as Bruce Wayne / Batman
Aaron Eckhart as Harvey Dent / Two-Face
Nestor Carbonell as Mayor Anthony Garcia
Plot: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime. With the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent, Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague the streets. The partnership proves to be effective, but they soon find themselves prey to a reign of chaos unleashed by a rising criminal mastermind known to the terrified citizens of Gotham as the Joker.

Title: 12 Angry Men
Plot: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence. What begins as an open-and-shut case of murder soon becomes a mini-drama of each juror's prejudices and preconceptions about the trial, the accused, and each other.

Title: Schindler's List
Actors: Martin S. Bergmann as Marcel Goldberg
Plot: The true story of how businessman Oskar Schindler saved over a thousand Jewish lives from the Nazis while they worked as slaves in his factory during World War II.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
Plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

Title: Mission: Impossible
Plot: An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.

Title: Mission: Impossible II
Plot: IMF agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called 'Chimera'.

Title: Mission: Impossible III
Actors: Philip Seymour Hoffman as Owen Davian
Jonathan Rhys Meyers as Declan Gormley
Plot: IMF agent Ethan Hunt comes into conflict with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer who threatens his life and his fiancée in response.

Title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
Plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

Title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
Plot: Ethan and his team take on their most impossible mission yet when they have to eradicate an international rogue organization as highly skilled as they are and committed to destroying the IMF.

Title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
Plot: A group of terrorists plans to detonate three plutonium cores for a simultaneous nuclear attack on different cities. Ethan Hunt, along with his IMF team, sets out to stop the carnage.

Title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One
Plot: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team must track down a dangerous weapon before it falls into the wrong hands.

Title: Iron Man
Plot: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

Title: The Incredible Hulk
Plot: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into whenever he loses his temper.

Title: Iron Man 2
Plot: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.

Title: Thor
Plot: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is Actors out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

Title: Captain America: The First Avenger
Plot: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a "Super-Soldier serum". But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a warmonger and a terrorist organization.

Title: The Avengers
Plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

Title: Iron Man 3
Plot: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.

Title: Thor: The Dark World
Plot: When the Dark Elves attempt to plunge the universe into darkness, Thor must embark on a perilous and personal journey that will reunite him with doctor Jane Foster.

Title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
Plot: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy
Plot: A group of intergalactic criminals are forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

Title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
Plot: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to the Avengers to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plans.

Title: Ant-Man
Plot: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.

Title: Captain America: Civil War
Plot: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

Title: Doctor Strange
Plot: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
Plot: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father the ambitious celestial being Ego.

Title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
Plot: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

Title: Thor: Ragnarok
Plot: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

Title: Black Panther
Plot: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.

Title: Avengers: Infinity War
Plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

Title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Plot: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family, and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

Title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Plot: Harry, Ron, and Hermione return to Hogwarts for their second Year, which proves to be more challenging than the last as the Chamber of Secrets has been opened.

Title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Plot: Harry's third Year sees him attending Hogwarts while a convicted murderer escapes from Azkaban.

Title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Plot: Harry finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic.

Title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Plot: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities.

Title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Plot: As Harry begins his sixth Year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as 'the property of the Half-Blood Prince'.

Title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
Plot: Harry, Ron, and Hermione leave Hogwarts behind and embark on a mission to find and destroy Voldemort's secret to immortality.

Title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
Plot: The final battle between Harry and Voldemort takes place at Hogwarts.

Title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
Plot: Two Jedi escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their original glory.

Title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
Plot: Ten Years after initially meeting, Anakin Skywalker shares a forbidden romance with Padmé Amidala, while Obi-Wan Kenobi discovers a secret clone army crafted for the Jedi.

Title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
Plot: Three Years into the Clone Wars, Obi-Wan Kenobi pursues a new threat, while Anakin Skywalker is lured by Chancellor Palpatine into a sinister Plot to rule the galaxy.

Title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
Plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

Title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
Plot: After the Rebel Alliance are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

Title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
Plot: After rescuing Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebel Alliance attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side.

Title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
Plot: As a new threat to the galaxy rises, Rey, a desert scavenger, and Finn, an ex-stormtrooper, must join Han Solo and Chewbacca to search for the one hope of restoring peace.

Title: Star Wars: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi
Plot: Rey develops her abilities with the help of Luke Skywalker, as the Resistance prepares for battle against the First Order.

Title: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
Plot: The surviving Resistance faces the First Order once again in the conclusion of the Skywalker saga.

Title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
Plot: In a time of conflict, a group of unlikely heroes band together on a mission to steal the plans to the Death Star, the Empire's ultimate weapon of destruction.

Title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
Plot: During an adventure in the criminal underworld, Han Solo meets his future co-pilot Chewbacca and Lando Calrissian Years before joining the Rebel Alliance.

Title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
Plot: As the Clone Wars sweep the galaxy, Anakin Skywalker and his new Padawan, Ahsoka Tano, embark on a mission to rescue the kidnapped son of Jabba the Hutt.

Title: Casino Royale
Plot: After earning a license to kill, secret agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, in Montenegro.

Title: Quantum of Solace
Plot: James Bond tries to stop an organization from eliminating a country's most valuable resource.

Title: Skyfall
Plot: James Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. When MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.

Title: Spectre
Plot: A cryptic message from James Bond's past sends him on a trail to uncover the existence of a sinister organization named SPECTRE.

Title: No Time to Die
Plot: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

Title: Jurassic Park
Plot: An industrialist invites some experts to visit his theme park of cloned dinosaurs. After a power failure, the creatures run loose, putting everyone's lives, including his grandchildren's, in danger.

Title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
Plot: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.

Title: Jurassic Park III
Plot: A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Grant to go to Isla Sorna for a holiday, but their unexpected landing startles the island's new inhabitants.

Title: Jurassic World
Plot: A new theme park, built on the original site of Jurassic Park, creates a genetically modified hybrid dinosaur, the Indominus Rex, which escapes containment and goes on a killing spree.

Title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
Plot: When the island's dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.

Title: Jurassic World: Dominion
Plot: Four Years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, Biosyn operatives attempt to track down Maisie Lockwood, while Dr. Ellie Sattler investigates a genetically engineered swarm of giant insects.

Title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
Plot: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, Elizabeth Swann, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

Title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
Plot: Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones' service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.

Title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
Plot: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must sail off the edge of the map, navigate treachery and betrayal, find Jack Sparrow, and make their final alliances for one last decisive battle.

Title: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
Plot: Jack Sparrow and Barbossa embark on a quest to find the elusive fountain of youth, only to discover that Blackbeard and his daughter are after it too.

Title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales
Plot: Captain Jack Sparrow searches for the Trident of Poseidon to rule the sea while being pursued by old rival Captain Salazar and a crew of deadly ghosts who have escaped from the Devil's Triangle.

Title: The Fast and the Furious
Plot: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Conner must decide where his loyalty really lies when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to end.

Title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
Plot: Former cop Brian O'Conner is called upon to bust a dangerous criminal and he recruits the help of a former childhood friend and street racer who has a chance to redeem himself.

Title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
Plot: A teenager becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.

Title: Fast & Furious
Plot: Brian O'Conner, back working for the FBI in Los Angeles, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltRated his operation.

Title: The Matrix
Plot: When computer hacker Neo is contacted by mysterious rebels, he discovers the shocking truth about his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

Title: The Matrix Reloaded
Plot: Neo and the rebels race against time before the machines discover the city of Zion and destroy it.

Title: The Matrix Revolutions
Plot: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.

Title: The Matrix Resurrections
Plot: Plagued by strange memories, Neo's life takes a different turn when he finds himself back inside the Matrix.

Title: John Wick
Plot: An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that took everything from him.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 2
Plot: After returning to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, John Wick discovers that a large bounty has been put on his life.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
Plot: John Wick is on the run for two reasons... he's being hunted for a global $14 million dollar open contract on his life, and for breaking a central rule: taking a life on Continental Hotel grounds.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 4
Plot: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

Title: Moneyball
Plot: The story of Billy Beane, the Oakland Athletics' general manager, who uses a data-driven approach to assembling a competitive baseball team despite a limited budget.

Title: Monkey Man
Plot: Patel stars as an unlikely hero who emerges from prison to take on a world enmeshed in corporate greed and eroding spiritual values, and seeking revenge from those who took everything from him Years before.

Title: The Continental
Plot: Set in 1970s New York City, The Continental explores the origin of the iconic hotel-for-assassins centerpiece of the John Wick universe seen through the eyes and action of a young Winston Scott.

Title: X-Men
Plot: In a world where mutants (evolved super-powered humans) exist and are discriminated against, two groups form for an inevitable clash: the supremacist Brotherhood, and the pacifist X-Men.

Title: X2: X-Men United
Plot: When anti-mutant Colonel William Stryker kidnaps Professor X and attacks his school, the X-Men must ally with their archenemy Magneto to stop him.

Title: X-Men: The Last Stand
Plot: The human government develops a cure for mutations, and Jean Grey becomes a darker uncontrollable persona called the Phoenix who allies with Magneto, causing escalation into an all-out battle for the X-Men.

Title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
Plot: The early Years of James Logan, featuring his rivalry with his brother Victor Creed, his service in the special forces team Weapon X, and his experimentation into the metal-lined mutant Wolverine.

Title: X-Men: First Class
Plot: In the 1960s, superpowered humans Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr work together to find others like them, but Erik's vengeful pursuit of an ambitious mutant who ruined his life causes a schism to divide them.

Title: The Wolverine
Plot: Wolverine comes to Japan to meet an old friend whose life he saved Years ago, and gets embroiled in a conspiracy involving yakuza and mutants.

Title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
Plot: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

Title: X-Men: Apocalypse
Plot: In the 1980s, the X-Men must defeat an ancient all-powerful mutant, En Sabah Nur, who intends to thrive by bringing destruction to the world.

Title: Logan
Plot: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

Title: Deadpool
Plot: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal yet hideously scarred, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

Title: Dead Poets Society
Plot: Set in the late 1950s, the film follows John Keating, who encourages his students to embrace poetry and seize the day, challenging the school's rigid traditions and the expectations placed upon them. His teachings inspire a group of boys, including Neil Perry and Todd Anderson, to pursue their passions and think independently, leading to profound personal transformations and tragic consequences.

Title: Deadpool 2
Plot: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool) assembles a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.

Title: Deadpool & Wolverine
Plot: Deadpool recruits a variant of Wolverine from another universe to help save his world from extinction after being offered a place in the Marvel Cinematic Universe by the Time Variance Authority.

Title: Toy Story
Plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

Title: Toy Story 2
Plot: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission.

Title: Toy Story 3
Plot: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a daycare center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college.

Title: Toy Story 4
Plot: Woody and Buzz LightYear embark on a road trip with Bonnie and a new toy named Forky.

Title: Transformers
Plot: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.

Title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
Plot: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.

Title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
Plot: The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets.

Title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
Plot: When humanity allies with a bounty hunter in pursuit of Optimus Prime, the Autobots turn to a mechanic and his family for help.

Title: Transformers: The Last Knight
Plot: A deadly threat from Earth's history reappears and a hunt for a lost artifact takes place between Autobots and Decepticons, while Optimus Prime encounters his creator in space.

Title: Bumblebee
Plot: On the run in the Year 1987, Bumblebee finds refuge in a junkyard in a small California beach town. Charlie Watson discovers Bumblebee, battle-scarred and broken.

Title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
Plot: During the '90s, a new faction of Transformers - the Maximals - join the Autobots as allies in the battle for Earth.

Title: Men in Black
Plot: James, an NYC cop, is hired by Agent K of a secret government agency that monitors extraterrestrial life on Earth. Together, they must recover an item that has been stolen by an intergalactic villain.

Title: Men in Black II
Plot: Agent J is sent to find Agent K and restore his memory after the re-appearance of a case from K's past.

Title: Men in Black 3
Plot: Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.

Title: Men in Black: International
Plot: The Men in Black have always protected the Earth from the scum of the universe. In this new adventure, they tackle their biggest, most global threat to date: a mole in the Men in Black organization.

Title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
Plot: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.
Director: William Cottrell, David Hand, Wilfred Jackson

Title: Pinocchio
Plot: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.
Director: Norman Ferguson, T. Hee, Wilfred Jackson

Title: Fantasia
Plot: A series of eight famous pieces of classical music, conducted by Leopold Stokowski and interpreted in animation by Walt Disney's team of artists.
Director: James Algar, Samuel Armstrong, Ford Beebe Jr.

Title: The Reluctant Dragon
Plot: Humorist Robert Benchley learns about the animation process at Walt Disney Studios while trying to find the great man himself to pitch him the idea of making a cartoon about a shy dragon.
Director: Alfred L. Werker, Hamilton Luske, Jack Cutting

Title: Dumbo
Plot: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.
Director: Samuel Armstrong, Norman Ferguson, Wilfred Jackson

Title: Bambi
Plot: The story of a young deer growing up in the forest.
Director: James Algar, Samuel Armstrong, David Hand

Title: Saludos Amigos
Plot: An anthology of animated shorts, including a documentary about the making of the film.
Director: Norman Ferguson, Wilfred Jackson, Jack Kinney

Title: The Three Caballeros
Plot: Donald Duck receives a box of gifts from his Latin American friends, each of which opens up to a magical world.
Director: Norman Ferguson, Clyde Geronimi, Jack Kinney

Title: Make Mine Music
Plot: An anthology of animated shorts, including a segment based on the story of Casey at the Bat.
Director: Clyde Geronimi, Jack Kinney, Hamilton Luske

Title: Fun and Fancy Free
Plot: An anthology of animated shorts, including a segment based on the story of Bongo the circus bear.
Director: Jack Kinney, Hamilton Luske, William Morgan

Title: Melody Time
Plot: An anthology of animated vignettes set to contemporary music.
Director: Clyde Geronimi, Wilfred Jackson, Jack Kinney

Title: So Dear to My Heart
Plot: This heartwarming classic tells the tale of a country boy who adopts a mischevious black lamb and learns valuable lessons about love and dedication.

Title: The Adventures of Ichabod and Mr. Toad
Plot: An animated adaptation of "The Wind in the Willows" followed by an adaptation of "The Legend of Sleepy Hollow".
Director: James Algar, Clyde Geronimi, Jack Kinney

Title: Cinderella
Plot: When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq and from her Fairy Godmother.
Director: Clyde Geronimi, Wilfred Jackson, Hamilton Luske

Title: Alice in Wonderland
Plot: Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.
Director: Clyde Geronimi, Wilfred Jackson, Hamilton Luske

Title: Peter Pan
Plot: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.
Director: Clyde Geronimi, Wilfred Jackson, Hamilton Luske

Title: Lady and the Tramp
Plot: A romantic adventure about a lovely lady dog and a roguish but charming tramp.
Director: Clyde Geronimi, Wilfred Jackson, Hamilton Luske

Title: A Bug's Life
Plot: A misfit ant, looking for warriors to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

Title: Monsters, Inc.
Plot: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.
Director: Pete Docter, David Silverman, Lee Unkrich

Title: Good Will Hunting
Plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

Title: Monsters at Work
Plot: Mechanic Tylor Tuskmon has big dreams of working his way up the ranks to the Laugh Floor at Monsters Inc.
creator: Bobs Gannaway

Title: Finding Nemo
Plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

Title: The Incredibles
Plot: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

Title: Cars
Plot: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

Title: Ratatouille
Plot: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

Title: WALL-E
Plot: In a distant, but not so unrealistic, future where mankind has abandoned earth, a waste management robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

Title: Up
Plot: 78-Year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young wilderness explorer named Russell with him.

Title: RRR
Plot: A fearless warrior on a perilous mission comes face to face with a steely cop serving British forces in this epic saga set in pre-independent India.

Title: K.G.F: Chapter 2
Plot: In the blood-soaked Kolar Gold Fields, Rocky's name strikes fear into his foes, while the government sees him as a threat to law and order.

Title: Ponniyin Selvan: Part I
Plot: Vandiyathevan crosses the Chola land to deliver a message from the Crown Prince Aditha Karikalan, while Kundavai attempts to establish political peace as vassals and petty chieftains Plot against the throne.

Title: Vikram
Plot: A special investigator discovers a case of serial killings is not what it seems to be, leading down a path of war between everyone involved.

Title: Kantara
Plot: When greed paves the way for betrayal, scheming, and murder, a young tribal reluctantly dons the traditions of his ancestors to seek justice.

Title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
Plot: Raj and Simran, two young people who have never met but whose parents were once classmates, fall in love on a trip across Europe.

Title: Sholay
Plot: Two criminals are hired to kidnap the daughter of a retired police officer, but the plan goes awry. The police officer then enlists the help of two petty thieves to take revenge.

Title: Mughal-E-Azam
Plot: The love story of Prince Salim and a court dancer, Anarkali, is complicated by the fact that their love is forbidden by Salim's father, Emperor Akbar.

Title: Deewar
Plot: Two brothers, one a policeman and the other a gangster, fight on opposite sides of the law. Their destiny is a reflection of the fate of their family.

Title: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India
Plot: In 1893, a village in colonial India, burdened by high taxes and several Years of drought, decides to play a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers as a wager to avoid paying the taxes.

Title: Pyaasa
Plot: A poet, ignored and mocked by society, finds true love and solace in a kind-hearted prostitute.

Title: Andaz Apna Apna
Plot: Two slackers compete to marry a heiress, but she falls for one of their intended grooms.

Title: The Basketball Diaries
Plot: The Basketball Diaries follows Jim Carroll, a promising high school basketball player whose life spirals into drug addiction, leading him to a life of crime and despair.

Title: Gangs of Wasseypur
Plot: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

Title: Raayan
Plot: Raayan, a fast-food hotel owner in North Chennai, gets caught in a gang war and must protect his family while seeking revenge for their deaths.

Title: Aadukalam
Plot: Falling in love with Irene as well as refusing to obey his boss complicates Karuppu's life as he becomes embroiled in the world of rooster fighting.

Title: Vada Chennai
Plot: A young carrom player in North Chennai becomes a reluctant participant in a war between two warring gangsters.

Title: Asuran
Plot: The teenage son of a farmer from an underprivileged Actorse kills a rich, upper Actorse landlord. How the pacifist farmer saves his hot-blooded son is the rest of the story.

Title: Raanjhanaa
Plot: Kundan, a young man from Varanasi, falls in love with Zoya, who is in love with someone else. His obsessive love leads to tragic consequences.

Title: Maryan
Plot: A contract worker in Sudan is abducted by mercenaries and his lover in India awaits his return.

Title: Velaiyilla Pattathari
Plot: A jobless young man gets to redeem himself and prove his worth.

Title: Karnan
Plot: Karnan, a fearless village youth, must fight for the rights of the conservative people of his village, due to the torture given by a police officer.

Title: Thiruchitrambalam
Plot: The story revolves around a young man who struggles to find love while dealing with his family and friends.

Title: Vaathi
Plot: A private school teacher faces challenges while trying to bring education to a neglected public school.

Title: Anniyan
Plot: Ramanujam, who suffers from multiple personality disorder, works as a lawyer by day and a vigilante at night, using tips from the 'Garuda Purana' as his tools to punish various antisocial elements.

Title: Pithamagan
Plot: Chittan, a social outActors, has grown up in a cemetery. A drug dealer finds him a job in a cannabis farm. In prison, he meets a conman, Shakti. This friendship transforms him from his stony existence.

Title: Deiva Thirumagal
Plot: A man with disabilities fights for custody of his 7-Year-old daughter, and in the process teaches his opponent lawyer the value of love and family.

Title: Thangalaan
Plot: Based on true events that revolve around the lives of a fierce tribal leader during the British Raj era who sets out to stop an apparent sorceress after earning her wrath when assisting a British general in tracing gold in their village.

Title: Saamy Square
Plot: A police officer's son takes on a powerful gangster, leading to a battle of wits and power.

Title: Kadaram Kondan
Plot: A man with a dark past must save his wife from a dangerous situation while dealing with his own demons.

Title: Mahaan
Plot: A man who leads a simple life is forced to choose between his family and his principles when faced with a moral dilemma.

Title: Drunken Master
Plot: A young man learns the art of drunken boxing to defeat a formidable enemy.

Title: Police Story
Plot: A Hong Kong cop tries to clear his name after being framed for murder.

Title: Rush Hour
Plot: A Hong Kong detective teams up with a wisecracking LAPD cop to rescue a Chinese diplomat's kidnapped daughter.

Title: Kung Fu Panda
Plot: A clumsy panda becomes an unlikely hero when he is unexpectedly chosen to fulfill an ancient prophecy.

Title: The Spy Next Door
Plot: A former CIA spy takes on his toughest assignment to babysit his neighbor's kids.

Title: Skiptrace
Plot: A detective from Hong Kong teams up with an American gambler to battle a notorious Chinese criminal.

Title: Vanguard
Plot: A security guard for a global company is tasked with protecting a businessman and his daughter from a mercenary group.
